{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Auctioneer Marcca |image = Portrait_Slave_Auctioneer_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Auctioneer Marcca.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Ocean |gender = Female |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = [Crookspur Slavers](/crookspurSlavers/) |deity = |personality = |class = Chanter |level = 12 |MIG = 11 |CON = 10 |DEX = 11 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 11 |health = 150 |damage = 18-22 {{pierce}} |accuracy = 69 |penetration = 8 |deflection = 54 |fortitude = 55 |reflex = 55 |will = 60 |dr = 3 |ability = [Fighting Spirit](/fightingSpiritDeadfire/), [Ancient Memory](/ancientMemoryDeadfire/), [At the Sight of their Comrades, their Hearts Grew Bold](/atTheSightOfTheirComradesTheirHeartsGrewBoldDeadfire/), [One Dozen Stood Against the Power of the Saint](/oneDozenStoodAgainstThePowerOfTheSaintDeadfire/), [They Shielded Their Eyes 'Gainst the Fampyr's Gaze](/theyShieldedTheirEyesGainstTheFampyrsGazeDeadfire/), [But Reny Daret's Ghost, He Would not Rest](/butRenyDaretsGhostHeWouldNotRestDeadfire/), [If their Bones Still Slept Under that Hill, None Can Say](/ifTheirBonesStillSleptUnderThatHillNoneCanSayDeadfire/), [...and Their Screams Reached The Heavens](/andTheirScreamsReachedTheHeavens/), [Oh, But Knock Not on the Door of Urdel and Gurdel](/ohButKnockNotOnTheDoorOfUrdelAndGurdelDeadfire/), [Gernisc's Beast Lit the Night with his Breath](/gerniscsBeastLitTheNightWithHisBreathDeadfire/), [The Lights Danced Across the Moor](/theLightsDancedAcrossTheMoor/), [What Rou Naka Found Down the Deep](/whatRouNakaFoundDownTheDeepDeadfire/) |location = [Crookspur](/crookspur/) |quests = [Clearing Out Crookspur](/clearingOutCrookspur/)
[Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/)
[A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |head = Vailian Hat |body = Vailian Frock Coat |weapon1 = Fine Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Pistol |internalname = NPC_SP_Auctioneer |guid = e30c0564-49c7-449e-88d0-1dcd386fd54d }} '''Auctioneer Marcca''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|"Finoma! At last, we reach the culmination of our lot today!" A stiff-backed woman gestures widely with her arms, gathering the crowd a hair closer. Excitement simmers amid buzzing voices and the low rattle of raffia hand fans. Anticipation hangs in the air. Then with a flick of her prim wrist, she hastens the final slave to step forward. He's a strapping, ugly-faced misborn, chains and the planks of the stage rattling with each of his heavy steps.}} Marcca is a Crookspur slave auctioneer, in charge of selling their finest "wares" to the customers of the seedy slave trading market. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/)
[Clearing Out Crookspur](/clearingOutCrookspur/)
[Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [A Shrewd Proposition](/aShrewdProposition/), [Clearing Out Crookspur](/clearingOutCrookspur/), [Cruel Cargo](/cruelCargo/): You can purchase [Handsome Eliam](/handsomeEliam/) from her, getting an easy audience with [Master Kua](/masterKua/). [Category:Crookspur characters](/categoryCrookspurCharacters/)

[[A Shrewd Proposition]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |head = Vailian Hat |body = Vailian Frock Coat |weapon1 = Fine Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Fine Pistol |internalname = NPC_SP_Auctioneer |guid = e30c0564-49c7-449e-88d0-1dcd386fd54d }} '''Auctioneer Marcca''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|"Finoma! At last, we reach the culmination of our lot today!" A stiff-backed woman gestures widely with her arms, gathering the crowd a hair closer. Excitement simmers amid buzzing voices and the low rattle of raffia hand fans. Anticipation hangs in the air. Then with a flick of her prim wrist, she hastens the final slave to step forward. He's a strapping, ugly-faced misborn, chains and the planks of the stage rattling with each of his heavy steps.}} Marcca is a Crookspur slave auctioneer, in charge of selling their finest "wares" to the customers of the seedy slave trading market. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[A Shrewd Proposition]]

[[Cruel Cargo]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[A Shrewd Proposition]], [[Clearing Out Crookspur]], [[Cruel Cargo]]: You can purchase [[Handsome Eliam]] from her, getting an easy audience with [[Master Kua]]. [[Category:Crookspur characters]]
title: Auctioneer Marcca
